description: International Petroleum Corp. operates as an exploration company. The company is headquartered in Vancouver, British Columbia and currently employs 131 full-time employees. The company went IPO on 2017-04-24. The firm is engaged in the production and exploration of oil and natural gas, as well as natural gas liquids. The firm is a direct or indirect owner of a number of subsidiaries of Lundin Petroleum AB. The firm has a portfolio of assets in three jurisdictions: Malaysia (Bertam), France (Paris and Aquitaine Basin) and the Netherlands. The portfolio is weighted towards light oil, with liquids representing 94% of 2P Reserves and with gas production generated primarily from the oil and gas assets in the Netherlands. The firm operates a majority of its produced volumes in the Paris Basin and Malaysia and owns non-operated interests in the Aquitaine Basin and the Netherlands.
naicsNationalIndustry: Crude Petroleum and Natural Gas Extraction
name: International Petroleum Corp
